1.name: wordpress/contact-form-7-customfield-in-mail
1.description:
Contact Form 7 is an awesome WordPress plugin that provides all sorts of great features for creating Contact Forms. I've used it on a lot of sites with great succes.

One thing it doesn't handle though, are customfields. With this plug in you can now use customfields in the mail section of Contact Form 7!

I created this plug-in because I had the need to use the same contact form on numerous places but the email adresses needed to be diffrent for all of them. (I was using it to create a showcase website in wich visitors are able to contact the creator of the work/art, without showing the full email adress)

What you could do with this might include:

  • Use the same contact form in different posts/pages
  • Send custom field values in the email

There are many more case-specific examples. I searched for a solution, but there was none to be found. This plugin provides an elegant solution that leaves the Contact Form 7 Plugin intact.
